Recently moved to the area. Tried the Roost for a playoff game and the atmosphere is terrific. The club sandwich is EXCELLENT with a smokey flavor. The wasabi seared tuna was crazy good! 100% will go back. Review by - google Vance D.: five star review by If you're in your 20's and 30's, this is a great place! Great music too. Just flew in to Charleston with 30 minutes before the New Year, found this place just a few blocks from my hotel just in time to celebrate! Review by - google Jennifer S.: five star review by Really cool bar. Bartenders are super nice and friendly. I didn't eat there, but the wings from the group beside look so big and tasty. We asked, and they liked. Good prices and cold beer. Review by - google Jay W.: five star review by A fun, local bar. Excellent food, friendly atmosphere and great cocktails / beer. The staff is always friendly and striving to make your experience a great one! Review by - google Averi M.: five star review by The roost is a wonderful place to go. Our waitress was super nice and attentive. But the food, holy moly. The food was absolutely incredible. Everything was hot, fresh and delicious. The chef even came out personally and checked on us to make sure we were happy.
